attributes.action: Hold UK citizen Altaf Hussein accountable for threats of mass terrorism against peaceful protestors in a foreign country
attributes.additional_details:
A UK citizen has vowed to unleash his supporters to commit mass terrorism on the peaceful protestors in Karachi if they do not disperse or give up the protest. As a UK resident myself, with many members of family based in Karachi:
(a) I am distressed that this man may indulge in acts of violence in the UK
(b) I am distressed that this man will harm me and other Pakistanis based in the UK
(c) I am distressed for my family members in Karachi who will be harmed if the authorities fail to warn or stop him.
